page.title: 09Shopping in Briton Ferry.
page.content: Jersey Bakery is a baker shop.Andy Glass is a place to buy glass. Interflora is a flower shop.Hilliers Bakery is another bakers shop.There is an Opticians shop where you can buy spectacles.There is a take-away where you can buy food.In The Pantry you can buy clothes,wool and clocks.There is a butchers shop called Woodley's and there is a D.I.Y. centre called Huckridge and Reynolds.The Spar is a grocers shop.The Hi-Fry is a chip shop.Mikes is a newsagent.The Flower Basket is a flower shop.Dan Davies is a greengrocers.They are all on Neath Road.A.Barret is a clothes shop and is in Caroline Street.The Wool Shop is on Shelone Road as well as the colour television shop.
